about_the_game:
Love as pure as moonlight
We must endure
For only time will tell.

Paper Bride 3 Unresolved Love - Original Soundtrack" is officially released!
This soundtrack contains 4 original songs from games, 2 of which are songs sung by real singer.
Theme song Unresolved Love and corresponding accompaniment
Interlude "Where Are You" and the corresponding accompaniment
The original disc mastering level lossless audio, the file in 2304kbps code rate WAV file format.

Hope that when you hear these songs, you can recall the joy and emotion you have experienced in the world of Paper Bride.
Thank you again for your support and love for Paper Bride series games, and look forward to the next encounter.

name: Paper Bride 3 Unresolved Love-Sound Track

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6550 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GT440（512M）or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7sp1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: I3 or AMD equivalent or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX560se or AMD Radeon equivalent or above
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Paper Bride 3 Unresolved Love - Original Soundtrack" is officially released! This soundtrack contains 4 original songs from games, 2 of which are songs sung by real singer.
supported_languages:
English, Japanese, Thai, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Vietnamese, Korean
*languages with full audio support
